item.title: Development for embedded devices
item.description: Developing an automatic plant irrigation system I was working with an Arduino the last few weeks and never did before. But not only an Arduino, the Arduino was cooperating with an circuit and communicating with a Raspberry Pi. Actually, it was pretty fun. But there were some problems for which I still don’t have a solution for. E.g. Arduino IDE not pushing the code with the following error message: avrdude: stk500_recv(): programmer is not responding.
Solving challenges using Capture-The-Flags! CTF Challenge 1 Footnotes .my-table th, .my-table td { padding: 20px; text-align: left; } # Topic URL 0 Raspberry DUMMY

Development for embedded devices Developing an automatic plant irrigation system I was working with an Arduino the last few weeks and never did before. But not only an Arduino, the Arduino was cooperating with an circuit and communicating with a Raspberry Pi. Actually, it was pretty fun. But there were some problems for which I still don't have a solution for. E.g. Arduino IDE not pushing the code with the following error message: avrdude: stk500_recv(): programmer is not responding.
Researching IT-Security! DOM-Clobbering Footnotes .my-table th, .my-table td { padding: 20px; text-align: left; } # Topic URL 0 DOM DUMMY
